name: Tala
description: This app implements various endpoint actions using Tala

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

actions.verbose: Update the name, url, and/or automation_mode for the project.

automation_mode.description: Means of deploying a policy. 'manual' indicates a control via UI and 'triggered' indicates control via APIs

actions.description: Initiate a scan on a project that has already been scanned
actions.verbose: The project scan details from the previous project's scan will be used.

actions.description: Retrieve the settings related to scanning a project

project_id.description: Id of project to settings of

actions.description: Get the abstract information model (AIM) representation of the latest scan on a project
actions.verbose: Summarize the abstract information model (AIM) representation of the latest scan on a given project. The AIM details includes the number of resources identified by the Tala scan, as well as relevant security headers, the Tala security score (out of 100) assigned to the site (both before and after applying the Tala policy generated for this scan), and suggestions for how the scan can be improved.

project_id.description: Id of project to summary of

example_values: {  "csp-policy-evaluation": {},  "csp-other-headers-evaluation": [    "The website is not using these security headers: X-Frame-Options, EXPECT-CT, X-Content-Type-Options, X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies, HPKP, X-XSS-Protection"  ],  "csp-resource-evaluation": []}

actions.description: Download an AIM policy bundle and import it to the vault
actions.verbose: Download the AIM bundle, which contains configuration data for enforcing a policy on one or more projects (Blocking). If server_conf is provided, the web server injection module, template matching library, and latest AIM policy are downloaded. If the configuration of the server is not binary compatible with a pre-built version of the web module, the source code for the web module will be downloaded instead.

project_ids.description: One or more project IDs to get summary of, separated by commas

actions.description: Synchronize projects to return a newer policy, which will be added to the vault
